name: memU
description: 为24/7智能体设计的记忆系统，用于持续运行的AI代理，可不断学习并预见用户需求

locomo.details: 92.09% average accuracy on Locomo benchmark across all reasoning tasks

innovations.name: 24/7 Proactive Monitoring
innovations.description: Continuously monitors user interactions asynchronously, extracting knowledge and predicting user needs without blocking primary flows

innovations.name: Hierarchical File System Memory
innovations.description: Organizes memory as a distributed directory structure with cross-references and symbolic links, enabling intuitive multi-level knowledge organization

innovations.name: Dual-Modal Hybrid Retrieval
innovations.description: Combines fast vector embedding search (RAG) with LLM-based deep reasoning for balanced cost-accuracy tradeoffs

innovations.name: Zero-Latency Memory Availability
innovations.description: New memories are immediately queryable, supporting real-time context injection into agent responses without indexing delays

innovations.name: Multi-Provider LLM Compatibility
innovations.description: Seamless switching between OpenAI, Grok, Qwen, Doubao, and OpenRouter for flexible cost optimization and model selection

innovations.name: Proactive Learning Pipeline
innovations.description: Automatically extracts and categorizes knowledge, skills, behavioral patterns, and tool usage from continuous interaction streams

innovations.name: Multi-Modal Resource Support
innovations.description: Handles text conversations, documents, images, audio, and video in unified framework with modal-specific processing

innovations.name: Workflow-Driven Architecture
innovations.description: Customizable execution pipelines with step-level interceptors, enabling deep integration with external systems and business logic

examples: Meeting preparation with historical context injection
Continuous financial data monitoring and alerts
Trend analysis with multi-week historical context
Anomaly detection in metrics and KPIs
Research paper analysis and cross-reference tracking
Knowledge graph building from unstructured data
Author style learning and consistency enforcement

value_propositions.name: 24/7主动式记忆监控
value_propositions.description: 通过异步持续监控用户交互和主动学习流水线,自动提取知识、技能、行为模式,在Locomo基准达到92.09%平均准确率,实现零延迟记忆可用性(新记忆即时可查询),支持主动预见用户需求。

value_propositions.name: 层次化文件系统记忆
value_propositions.description: 采用分布式目录结构组织记忆(类文件系统),结合交叉引用和符号链接实现直观的多层级知识组织,通过双模混合检索(快速向量嵌入+LLM深度推理)平衡成本和准确性,支持多模态资源(文本、文档、图像、音频、视频)统一处理。
